publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-784 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Councils for Voluntary Service Funding—That the Parliament notes the recent review of Councils of Voluntary Service (CVS); further notes the concerns expressed by rural CVS over proposals for a new national funding regime based on population and fixed shared funding ratio, and urges the Scottish Executive to adopt a funding model which will offer improvement in funding in all cases. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*

S1M-784 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Councils for Voluntary Service Funding—That the Parliament notes the recent review of Councils of Voluntary Service (CVS); further notes the concerns expressed by rural CVS over proposals for a new national funding regime based on population and fixed shared funding ratio, and urges the Scottish Executive to adopt a funding model which will offer improvement in funding in all cases. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Fergus Ewing*
